Function reference

All functions

abundance_and_occupancy_core()
Proportion of Reads and Replicates:
abundance_core()
Summation of Reads:
arabidopsis
Descritpion for subset of Arabidopsis dataset used for comparison of core assignment methods
common_core()
Common Core
core_methods()
Combine Methods
core_plots()
Generate a plot using the output from combined_methods
core_venn()
Core Venn Diagram
hard_cutoff()
Hard Cut-Off
human_stool
Descritpion for subset of the human microbiome dataset used for comparison of core assignment methods. Methods for filtering of the original dataset can be found in data-raw/human.R.
occupancy_core()
Proportion of Replicates
summarise_taxa()
Calculate the mean, variance and CV of each OTU
transpose_taxa()
If data are arranged where taxa are columns and sites rows we need to transpose the data for downstream analysis
